cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature attacks, choose one—
• If you control another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
• The base power and toughness of other attacking creatures you control become equal to this creature’s power and toughness until end of turn.

Exalted [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. If you do, each player loses life equal to that card’s mana value.

[i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among permanents you control.)[/i]
Flow — {3}{U}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](Each creature you control that you tap pays for {1}.)[/i]

[i]Damned[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature if you sacrificed a permanent this turn.
When this creature dies, create X 1/1 black Demon Insect creature tokens, where X is this creature’s power.

Flying, vigilance
As long as this creature is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of cards in your graveyard. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.

When this enchantment enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.

When this creature enters, you may search your library for a creature or land card with mana value 1 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{1}{G}: You may return another creature or land you control to its owner’s hand. If you do, this creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

Flying, vigilance
As long as this creature is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of cards in your graveyard. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.

When Gereishin enters, you may cast a Dragon spell or a spell with mana value 6 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

Flying
When Gereishin enters, you may cast a Dragon spell or a spell with mana value 6 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
Once during each of your turns, whenever you cast a spell, if the amount of mana spent to cast it was less than its mana value, Gereishin deals damage to each non-Dragon creature equal to that spell’s mana value.

Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
At the beginning of your end step, this enchantment deals 3 damage to any target if you sacrificed three or more permanents this turn.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an exalted counter on this enchantment. 
Whenever a creature you control attacks, draw X cards if its power is greater than 7, where X is the difference.

Choose one or more—
• Exile each artifact with mana value X or less.
• Exile each creature with mana value X or less. 
• Exile each enchantment with mana value X or less.

Time loop [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Remove    them all after III.)[/i]
I — [i]“Here, I will make my home, my prison, my rock to which I am forever bound.”[/i]
II — [i]“If I am to live in this world in perpetuity, it will join me at the dusk of time.”[/i]
III — You may cast a copy of the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
